metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46734 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Symfony is a PHP framework for web and console applications and a set of reusable PHP components. Starting in versions 2.0.0, 5.0.0, and 6.0.0 and prior to versions 4.4.51, 5.4.31, and 6.3.8, some Twig filters in CodeExtension use `is_safe=html` but don't actually ensure their input is safe. As of versions 4.4.51, 5.4.31, and 6.3.8, Symfony now escapes the output of the affected filters.

criterions.comment: symfony package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
